name: google-chrome-go-to-tab
title: Google Chrome Tab Search
description: Search and open tabs in Google Chrome.
author: Codely

commands.name: google-chrome-go-to-tab
commands.title: Search Tabs
commands.subtitle: Google Chrome
commands.description: List all tabs and go to the selected.

preferences.name: useOriginalFavicon
preferences.title: Extract the favicon from every open tab
preferences.description: Before enable this, you should enable 'View > Developer > Allow JavaScript from Apple Events' in every Google Chrome profile.
